name: Arjit Mishra
summary: A results-driven Data Science professional with expertise in Python, SQL, machine learning, and Gen AI. Skilled in creating prediction models and developing AI-powered solutions to solve complex business challenges.

education.degree: B.Tech in Artificial Intelligence Machine Learning
education.institution: Gyan Ganga Institute of Technology and Sciences

responsibilities: Deployed a healthcare recommendation RAG, processing patient health metrics to provide personalized health insights with 87% accuracy and reduced response latency by 60% through efficient caching.
Developed a multimodal RAG system using GCP Vertex AI platform that seamlessly integrated medical imaging analysis with textual patient records.
Engineered monitoring and feedback loop systems for continuous model improvement, including recommendation quality tracking.
Led the development of an ATS Resume Analyzer using Gemini Pro 1.5 model, successfully deploying it on Streamlit to provide automated resume screening and analysis capabilities.
Gained hands-on experience with Googleâ€™s generative AI models, focusing on prompt engineering and model fine-tuning.

projects.name: Classification of Disaster Tweets
projects.description: Classified tweets as disaster-related or not using NLP techniques, including text cleaning, tokenization, and feature extraction (TF-IDF, word embeddings). Achieved 82% accuracy using algorithms like Logistic Regression, Random Forest, and XGBoost with hyperparameter tuning.

projects.name: ML Algorithm for Stack Exchange
projects.description: Developed a machine learning model predicting scores on Stack Exchange (e.g., question quality, answer quality, user reputation) using NLP, word embeddings, vectorization, and model training.

projects.name: Smart Search Tool
projects.description: Built a course discovery platform leveraging web scraping, RAG with FAISS, and LangChain for hyper-personalized recommendations. Utilized Python, BeautifulSoup, and vector embeddings for AI-powered education.
